Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a U-shaped decoration at the top, detachable strap at the back of the neck and a concealed silicone trim at the top.

Fully lined swimsuit with ties at the back of the neck, padded cups with removable inserts and laser-cut, scalloped edges.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with woven stripes. Collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and short cap sleeves with a drawstring at the top. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, frilled collar and decorative drawstring with tassels. Flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, short butterfly sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, frilled collar and decorative drawstring with tassels. Flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, short butterfly sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in patterned, softly draping satin made partly from recycled polyester with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Wide, covered elastication at the waist and wide, gently flared legs with sewn-in creases down the front and sturdier side panels with decorative stitching.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, contrasting colour panels along the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake flap back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.

Trousers in a crinkled organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated hems.

Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
